title: SQLDROP COLUMN Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLDROP COLUMN Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
DROP COLUMN
The
DROP COLUMN
command is used to delete a column in an 
existing table.
The following SQL deletes the "ContactName" column from the "Customers" table:
Example
ALTER TABLE Customers
DROP COLUMN ContactName;

Reference

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:

DROP COLUMN ContactName;

summary: This tutorial covers SQLDROP COLUMN Keyword concepts and techniques.
